channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration offering buyouts to nearly all federal workers
item.description: The Trump administration is offering millions of federal workers the option to accept buyouts through a government-wide "deferred resignation" program...

item.title: Truth Social parent ‘DJT’ says it will launch financial services for ‘patriots’
Man arrested with Molotov cocktails aimed to kill Treasury secretary at Capitol, police say
item.description: The nomination of Scott Bessent as Treasury secretary by President Donald Trump was confirmed Monday by the Senate.

item.title: Trump social-media stock ‘DJT’ up 6.5% on financial-services pitch to ‘patriots’
How a more focused index-fund approach can reduce your stock-market risk
White House says Medicaid portal 'will be back online shortly' after Trump funding freeze blamed
item.description: A funding freeze ordered by the Trump administration has sparked widespread confusion about its effects on government programs such as Medicaid.

item.title: Blue-chip and tech stocks part ways ahead of Fed decision and earnings reports
Judge pauses Trump funding freeze order until Feb. 3
item.description: The Trump administration order would have frozen the issuance of existing federal grants and loans until agencies vetted them.

item.title: Investors should be buying this tech-stock dip, says Goldman Sachs
Trump classified documents case: DOJ drops appeal against co-defendants
item.description: President Donald Trump had been charged in the case with crimes related to retaining classified documents and obstructing efforts to recover them.
